page.title: 11THE FARM MANAGER (1 of 2)
page.content: THIS PART OF LARGATE FARM IS USED AS THE SICK BAY FOR THE REST OF THE FARM.WE HAVE A BEEF HERD AND A SINGLE SUCKLER HERD.IF ANY OF THE MOTHERS DIED WE TAKE THEM IN AND FEED THEM ON A MILK SUBSTITUTE,OTHER REASONS THAT THEY'RE NOT WELL OR THEY'VE HURT THEMSELVES.THIS IS A FIDDLY JOB AS WE CALL IT.THE MEN THEY LIKE THE CALVES BUT I THINK THEY TEND NOT TO LOOK ON THEM AS MUMS DO.SO WE REALLY GET A PLEASURE OUT OF THESE.THIS YEAR WE HAVE A NEW BREED WHICH IS A LIMOUSIN.WE HAVE VARIOUS COWS .WE FIND NOW THAT PEOPLE HAVE GONE OFF EATING FATTY MEATS SO WE NOW HAVE TO BREED FOR THE MARKET.THIS BREED IS ONE OF THE FRENCH TYPES WHICH ACTUALLY HAVE MORE MUSCLE THAN FAT.SO WE HAVE HAD PROBLEMS WITH THE CALVING.THIS LITTLE CALF,HIS MOTHER DIDN'T HAVE ANY MILK AT BIRTH AT ALL, AND DIDN'T HAVE
